People

We are looking for new Postdocs, PhD students and Master/Bachelor students to join HASLab and work on storage research topics.
If you are interested in working with us, please send me an email.

Alumni

  • Alexandre Silva, MSc Thesis - “DEDISbench++: Avaliação realista de deduplicação e compressão em sistemas de armazenamento”, 2020.

We are part of the High-Assurance Software Laboratory, one of the integrated R&D centres of INESC TEC and a subunit of University of Minho.
